reference.title: Navigation panels
reference.shortdesc: There are three different tabs on the left hand side of CWRC-Writer.

section.title: Markup panel
section.p: The Markup panel displays the XML structure of the document. From here you can add, delete, edit, and copy and paste tags in the document.

In the Markup panel, a single click right click (or control click on a Mac) selects both the tag and the contents. Deleting will delete both. A double click selects the content of the tag only. Deleting deletes the text only and more text can then be typed to replace it.

section.title: Entities panel
section.p: The entities panel lets users see the entities that they have tagged in the document (date, organization, title, etc). You may view the items in this tab either sequentially or by category.

section.title: Relations panel
section.p: In the relations panel you may view any relationships, which you have established between entities. You can establish relationships through the Add Relations button in the toolbar at the top of the page or at the bottom of this panel. You can also delete relations at the bottom of the panel.
